description: Try our easy to follow Honeyed Duck Strips In Lettuce 'Boats' recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Honeyed Duck Strips In Lettuce 'Boats' Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 duck breasts, about 175 g each, cut into thin strips
1 small carrot, peeled and grated (To garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a heavy-based frying pan. Toss the duck strips with the Chinese five spice powder in a bowl, then fry over a high heat for 8-10 minutes until cooked and crispy. Add the soy sauce and honey and cook for a further 2 minutes to coat in the sticky glaze. Scatter with the sesame seeds and keep warm.
Wash and pat dry the lettuce leaves and place on a serving board. Place spoonfuls of the duck into the leaves, then garnish each with the spring onions and carrot.
Serve with crusty bread, if liked.
